form of propaganda is so sinister. By teaching kids to 'lovingly' 
discriminate and shame LGBT people, you are reinforcing these backwards 
ideas and reinforcing them in mainstream thought. Being gay or transgender 
isn't something you can just drop and leave behind, it'll be more 
comparable to an arm or a leg that you can't ever cut off, no matter how 
hard you try. Being closeted is like constantly breaking that arm in vain 
attempts to get rid of it, but all it ever does is hurt you. You can 
smother it, tie it closely to your chest and pretend it doesn't exist, but 
it will still be there, and the pain won't stop until you set it free and 
embrace that yes, you do have this arm, and it's here to stay (I hope this 
analogy makes sense)
